testcase.name: Loading a string path returns bytes and a file source uniform resource identifier
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Loading a string path returns bytes and a file source uniform resource identifier Given I have a file "hello.txt" with contents "hello" ... passed in 0.000s When I load the source "hello.txt" ... passed in 0.000s Then the source payload filename is "hello.txt" ... passed in 0.000s And the source payload source uniform resource identifier starts with "file://" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
